column2: Marginal Prince: Gekkeiju no Ouji-tachi - Tokyo Merry-Go-Round

Keita and the other Marginal Prince are away from St. Alphonso Academy and meet each other in the city, where they meet Keita's sister.

Extra episode released with the 7th DVD volume.
['Grant, Joshua', 'de Saint Germain, Henri-Hugues', 'Yuuta', 'Clark, Sylvain', 'Kobayashi, Haruya', 'Visconti, Alfred']
